heif.boxes

Class AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.boxes.Box
      • heif.boxes.FullBox
        • heif.boxes.AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox

  • public class AuxiliaryTypePropertyBox
extends FullBox
    Represents the auxc (Auxiliary Type Property Box), providing auxiliary image type information. Auxiliary images shall be associated with an AuxiliaryTypeProperty as defined here. It includes a URN identifying the type of the auxiliary image. it may also include other fields, as required by the URN.

    Specification Reference: ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017 on Page 14

    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • logBoxInfo

        public void logBoxInfo()
        Logs the box hierarchy and internal entry data at the debug level.

        It provides a visual representation of the box's HEIF/ISO-BMFF structure. It is intended for tree traversal and file inspection during development and degugging if required.

        Overrides:
        logBoxInfo in class FullBox
